summary: During the 1950s, a man's car trip from L.A. to Texas turns into a Cold-War espionage drama when his car breaks down and he accepts a lift from a stranger.
cast: Ruth Roman|Sterling Hayden|Werner Klemperer|Richard Gaines|Charles Davis|Jeanne Cooper|Peter Hansen|Karl Ludwig Lindt|John Mitchum|John Frederick|Leonard Bremen|Sidney Clute|Ken Curtis|Harry Hines|Tom McKee|Bert Stevens
title: Red Invisible
